title: Slasher DB backup not working on Windows 10
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description DB Backup is not working for the slasher on Windows 10. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? No, this is a new enhancement as of 1.0.4 ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Run slasher with these flags: C:\prysm\prysm.bat slasher --enable-db-backup-webhook --db-backup-output-dir="D:\Slasher_Backup" Data backup does not occur. Upon going to a web browser and visiting localhost:8082/db/backup you get a panic in the slasher logs. ## üî• Error 

2020/12/07 20:17:07 http: panic serving 127.0.0.1:61425: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
goroutine 361 [running]:
net/http.(*conn).serve.func1(0xc00145a140)
